text: Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Zhege zhenli shi cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de, shei yuan xin, shei jiu xin; shei bu yuan xin, shei ke buxin.” Wo dique wei bu yi zhe zhunbeile huo yu [zhu], huo yu zhi qiang [lieyan] jiang baowei zhu tamen. Jiaru tamen [yin jiaoke er] qiujiu, jiang gei tamen yi zhong feishui ban hui shao mian de tong shui he. Zhe zhong yinliao zhen kepa! Zhe zhong guisu zhen elie!
